issue.title: [CF 715] Icons not updating and procs not working
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SPyroblast! ^SShowTTText^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N61022^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

also my  invokers energy icon doesnt seem to update OR my living bomb debuff here are there strings. They only update if I use a spell or cooldown that changes another icon for tellmehwen, then it seems to update to where it should be. But sometimes the icons stay up or dont show up. Its pretty random.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^STALENTLEARNED ^SName^Sinvocation ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SName^S116257 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowWhen^N1 ^SCustomTex^S116257 ^SEnabled^B ^t^N61022^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

and

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SLiving~`Bomb ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N1 ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^STALENTLEARNED ^SName^SLiving~`Bomb ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N61022^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Playing fire and getting a Pyroblast! proc
2. Icon doesnt show
3. Icon gives me errors until the proc has been used or falls off.

Evocating the full duration should make the invokers energy icon dissapear, sometimes it stays showing as if I do not have the buff. The living bomb icon should stop showing once I put a living bomb on the target but when I do this sometimes it remains showing as if there is no living bomb on my target.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

The icon for pyroblast! should show up and dissapear when I use a pyroblast

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:155: table index is nil
Time: 11/28/12 13:46:33
Count: 2956
Stack: [C]: ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:155: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:153>
...llMeWhen\Components\IconTypes\IconType_buff\buff.lua:274: in function `UpdateFunction'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3969: in function `Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1887: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1862>

this is the pyroblast icons error.

I do not have error logs for the invokers or living bomb icons. It just seems that the addon isnt updating or refreshing icons quickly enough in response to procs and buffs in real time.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

here is my complete string for the character if that helps at all

comments.body:
Thanks for posting a ticket! They make it much easier for me to keep track of bugs than the comments on Curse.com do. :)

For this issue, in case you missed my response over there, please try out r679 - it should fix the issue. You can download it here: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/

Edited Nov 28, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Going to close the ticket since you said over on the Curse.com comments that r679 fixed the issue for you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
